list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Refactor UI components and update project structure
Removed unused UI components (Button, Input, Label, LoginForm) and utility functions to simplify the codebase. Improved `Navbar` functionality with router-based navigation and support for mobile/desktop views. Updated `index.html` and CSS for enhanced styling, localization, and performance optimizations.

task.summary:
Initialize frontend project with main app structure and components
Set up a Vite React TypeScript project for "Canchas UCENIN" featuring key components such as Navbar, Hero, Features, and Footer. Added styling with TailwindCSS, implemented smooth scrolling, and included utility components like Button and Input. Configuration files and Git ignore settings were also established.

Initialize frontend project with main app structure and components
Set up a Vite React TypeScript project for "Canchas UCENIN" featuring key components such as Navbar, Hero, Features, and Footer. Added styling with TailwindCSS, implemented smooth scrolling, and included utility components like Button and Input. Configuration files and Git ignore settings were also established.

Remove IDE-specific files and update favicon link in index.html
Deleted various .idea configuration files and directories for a cleaner repo, as these are IDE-specific and unnecessary for version control. Also, updated the favicon link in the frontend's index.html to use a new JPEG image instead of the previous SVG.

Add JetBrains IDE config files and project initialization
Added `.idea` configuration to facilitate JetBrains IDE setup, including project settings, modules management, and VCS mappings. Initialized the frontend project structure with Vite React TypeScript, including core components, TailwindCSS styling, and smooth scrolling features.

Refactor UI components and update project structure
Removed unused UI components (Button, Input, Label, LoginForm) and utility functions to simplify the codebase. Improved `Navbar` functionality with router-based navigation and support for mobile/desktop views. Updated `index.html` and CSS for enhanced styling, localization, and performance optimizations.

Refactor UI components and update project structure
Removed unused UI components (Button, Input, Label, LoginForm) and utility functions to simplify the codebase. Improved `Navbar` functionality with router-based navigation and support for mobile/desktop views. Updated `index.html` and CSS for enhanced styling, localization, and performance optimizations.

MESSAGE.value:
Remove outdated readmes and add JetBrains IDE config files.
Deleted unused readme files from the backend and frontend. Added `.idea` directory configuration files to set up JetBrains IDE project settings, including ignored files, module configurations, and version control mappings.

Initialize frontend project with main app structure and components
Set up a Vite React TypeScript project for "Canchas UCENIN" featuring key components such as Navbar, Hero, Features, and Footer. Added styling with TailwindCSS, implemented smooth scrolling, and included utility components like Button and Input. Configuration files and Git ignore settings were also established.

Remove IDE-specific files and update favicon link in index.html
Deleted various .idea configuration files and directories for a cleaner repo, as these are IDE-specific and unnecessary for version control. Also, updated the favicon link in the frontend's index.html to use a new JPEG image instead of the previous SVG.

Add JetBrains IDE config files and project initialization
Added `.idea` configuration to facilitate JetBrains IDE setup, including project settings, modules management, and VCS mappings. Initialized the frontend project structure with Vite React TypeScript, including core components, TailwindCSS styling, and smooth scrolling features.

Refactor UI components and update project structure
Removed unused UI components (Button, Input, Label, LoginForm) and utility functions to simplify the codebase. Improved `Navbar` functionality with router-based navigation and support for mobile/desktop views. Updated `index.html` and CSS for enhanced styling, localization, and performance optimizations.
